madampe samuha ee. pi. gunarathnapanduwasnuwara batahira pradeshiya shasanarakshaka bala mandalaye dewana kalapaye lekhakadhikari dhurayata diggala gedara shri shailathalarama purana wiharasthanaye wiharadhipathi, wahanthare siddhartha himiyo dewana waratath nitharangayen theri pathwuha.unwahanse kurunagala bauddhaloka widyayathana maha piriwene pariwenadhipathi saha panduwasnuwara thoragalla shri medhankara bauddha madhyasthanaye wiharadhipathidhurayada darathi.madampe samuha - ee. pi. gunarathnathangalla pradeshiya shasanarakshaka balamandalaye pradhana lekhakadhikari dhurayata kudawalla walukarama maha wiharaya, thalalla lanka rajamaha wiharaya, morakatiaara somagiri wiharaya yana wiharasthana adhipathi mawalle jayasiri nahimiyo nitharagayen pathwuha.unwahanse shri kalyaniwansha mulika piriwene pariwenadhipathi, dakunu palath sanskruthika amathyanshaye upadeshaka, esema hambanthota disawe nagenahira giruwapaththuwe pradhana sanghanayaka dhuraya da hobawathi.theldeniya madumbara pradeshiya shasanarakshaka bala mandalaye nawa lekhakadhikari lesa karalliyadda shri uposhatharamadhipathi katakambaure dhammaloka himiyan mewara nitharangayen path kara atha.theldeniya bathalawaththa nigrodharama wiharasthana bauddha widuhale widuhalpathi himiyan lesa katayuthu karana unwahanse theldeniya madadumbara pradeshaye bodu janathawage shasanika aagamika ha samajamaya unnathiya udesa wishala mehewarak itu karana himinamaki.chayarupaya - karalliyadda samuhakambaurupitiya, malana, ‚Äòudara‚Äô niwase, aariyapala widanapathirana saha wirasinha thalawitage dayani ge dayabara puthanuwan wu mathara, kambaurupitiya, maha widyalaye shishya, janith udara widanapathirana kula kumaruwa pasugiyada ambauldeniya wijitharama wiharasthanaye di , muruthamure panynyaloka himiyange aacharyathwayen pawidi bimata piwisini.

"hondama pasala langama pasala" wadasatahana yatathe pasal diyunu kirima, 13 wasaraka pasal adhyapanaya aniwarya kirima, suraksha rakshana kramaya handunwadima, tab pariganaka labadima athulu wadasatahan gananawak osse adhyapanaye wadath paladayi ha gunathmaka wenaskam rasak sidukirimata gatha wu wasara kihipaya thula thamata ha thama aanduwata hakiwu bawa me awasthawata ekwu akila wiraj kariyawasam sandahan kaleya.

nidahas ha samakami wathawaranayak yatathe sanwardhana kara gaman karana shri lankawe wegawath sanwardhanaya wenuwen rupiyal koti 4,420 ka (amerikanu dolar miliyana 340) aadhara mudalak shri lankawata labadima sandaha koriyanu rajaya thiranaya kara atha.2012 - 2016 kalaya thula sanwardhana wyapruthi kriyathmaka kirima wenuwen me aadharaya shri lankawata labadena athara eya ek ek kshethrayanhi sanwardhana wyapruthi rasak kriyathmaka kirima sandaha wana bawa shri lankawe koriyanu thanapathi karyalaye jyeshta prakashikawak "dinamina" ta pawasuwaya.me aadharaya shri lankawata athishaya wadagath bawa penwadena shri lankawe koriyanu thanapathi karyalaya koriyanu rajaye nila sanwardhana aadhara wadasatahana yatathe labadena ema naya aadharaya wasara 40 kadi gewime hakiyawa pawathina bawada ee wenuwen aya karanuye siyayata 0.15 k tharam awama poliyak bawada penwa deyi.dingu kalayaka sita shri lankawe wiwidha kshethrayanhi sanwardhana katayuthu wenuwen koriyanu rajaya aadhara labadena bawa sandahan kala ema prakashikawa marga idikirima, jala sapayum, rohal, ee rajyaya, wruththiya puhunu pasal, rajya godanangili, parisaraya athulu ansha rasak yatathe adala sanwardhana wyapruthi kriyathmaka wana bawada sandahan kalaya.me ek ek kshethrayan wenuwen pasugiya 1991 wasare sita koriyanu rajaya wisin shri lankawata aadhara labadena athara ema kalaye sita pasugiya 2012 dakwa wu kalaya wenuwen wenkara thibena aadhara mudala rupiyal koti 5,600 k pamana weyi.yuda gatum nimawata pathkala shri lankawa ada wanawita wegawath sanwardhanayak kara gaman karamin sitina bawa penwadena shri lankawe koriyanu thanapathi karyalaya pasugiya kalayedi merata rajayata sahayogaya labadun ayurin idiriyatath sahayogaya labadena bawada kiyasiti.
